full_summary:
=========

Delivery and Installation of Theatre Seating
--------------------------------------------

**Tender Reference | Numéro de réference :** WS3707890612-Doc3708044207

**Publication Date | Date de publication :** 26 October 2022

**Lieu de livraison | Place of delivery:** Winnipeg

### Call for Proposals | Demande de propositions

**Project Overview:**
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND) is inviting bids to design, supply, and install 119 new theatre seats and related goods in the Barker College theatre at 17 Wing Winnipeg (Building 84).

**Contract Scope:**
This project will encompass the supply and delivery of 119 theatre seats in the college theatre, Building 84, along with the necessary goods and materials. The installation must be completed by March 15, 2023. The theatre seats must conform to specific requirements outlined in the contract documents.

**Notice Information:**
*   **Solicitation Number | Numéro de sollicitation:** WS3707890612
*   **Amendment Number | Numéro d'amélioration:** 2
*   **Tender Closing Date | Date limite de soumission:** 18 November 2022, 14:00:00 CDT
*   **Expected Contract Start Date | Date de début prévue du contrat:** Not specified
*   **Expected Contract End Date | Date de fin prévue du contrat:** 31 March 2024

**Selection Criteria | Criteres de sélection:**
This contract will be awarded to the bidder offering the lowest price.

**Important Notes:**

<https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14472266?extsite=MTQ0NzIyNjZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>

*   **Fax | Faxe:** None
